first_para: Andrew Hartley Dismore (born 2 September 1954) is a British Labour and Co-operative Party politician who has been the Member of the London Assembly for Barnet and Camden since 2012, and was the Member of Parliament (MP) for Hendon from 1997 until 2010.

full.extract: Andrew Hartley Dismore (born 2 September 1954) is a British Labour and Co-operative Party politician who has been the Member of the London Assembly for Barnet and Camden since 2012, and was the Member of Parliament (MP) for Hendon from 1997 until 2010.
full.title: Andrew Dismore
